The plot revolves around three friends trying to recapture their college glory days by opening a fraternity near their alma mater. Another great option is "Mr. Bean's Holiday," where the lovable Mr. Bean finds himself in France causing all sorts of humorous chaos! Both films are sure to provide plenty of laughs!

On the other hand, "I Heart Huckabees" is a unique, thought-provoking film with an ensemble cast including Dustin Hoffman and Lily Tomlin, following two investigators who help others solve their existential crises. Hope either (or both) of these films pique your interest!
